parameter.name: cql
parameter.description: A cql query string to use to locate content.

parameter.name: cqlContext
parameter.description: The context to execute a cql search in, this is the json serialized form of SearchContext

parameter.name: expand
parameter.description: A comma separated list of properties to expand on the content.

parameter.name: start
parameter.description: The start point of the collection to return.

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: The limit of the number of items to return, this may be restricted by fixed system limits.
